_header: Not long ago a marvelous thing
Subjects: saints’ lives; miracles; Thomas of Canterbury, saint
_description: Gilbert Bannister, Miraculum sancti Thome martyris — five stanzas rhyme royal with refrain, ‘Nouis fulget Thomas miraculis’

CamCCC417.First Lines:
Not longe a go a meruelys thyngwhich was don the vijth
                    day of Julij…
CamCCC417.Last Lines:
…Off his request ne shall he fayle nor mysNouis fulget
                        Thomas miraculis
